issue.title: [Python] pyarrow.compute functions don't convert args with __arrow_array__.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15210](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15210). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When the compute functions pack args, lists and numpy arrays are converted into arrow arrays, but objects with `__arrow_array__` defined aren't. A TypeError is raised.
